entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
